title: Scientometric analysis of geostatistics using multivariate m
author: Feng Zhou; Huai-Cheng Guo; Yuh-Shan Ho; Chao-Zhong Wu
description: Multivariate methods were successfully employed in a comprehensive scientometric analysis of geostatistics research, and the publications data for this research came from the Science Citation Index a
